mapper.select: select mem_code from member where name=#{lessee_name} and tel=#{lessee_tel}

select count(*) as priv_code from constract where priv_code>20 and priv_code<=30

select count(*) as mem_plan from member where mem_plan='standard_monthly'

select count(*) as mem_plan from member where mem_plan='premium_annual'

select rownum as inq_indexnum, inq_code, inq_title, inq_content, to_char(inq_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as inq_date, inq_name, inq_tel, inq_email, inq_people, inq_coname, inq_branch, inq_website from (select * from inquery order by inq_code)

select rownum as con_indexnum, con_code, lessor_name, lessee_name, lessee_tel, to_char(con_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as con_start_date, to_char(con_end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as con_end_date, to_char(con_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as con_date from (select * from constract order by con_code)

select rownum as member_indexnum, mem_code, name, tel, email, business_no, addr, id, pw, mem_plan, to_char(signup_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as signup_date, approval, ind_name from (select m.mem_code, m.name, m.tel, m.email, m.business_no, m.addr, m.id, m.pw, m.mem_plan, m.signup_date, m.approval, i.ind_name from member m, industry i where m.ind_code = i.ind_code order by mem_code) where approval = 'N'
select mem_code from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set approval=#{check} where mem_code=#{mem_code}
